participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Motivated and caring, she believes in the power of positive thinking.
participant_1.background: I'm a cancer survivor. I love running and preparing for marathons. I got a new job just yesterday to be a life coach. I am a clean eater. My parents were both very athletic.

participant_2.name: Amina
participant_2.personality: Resilient and expressive, she finds joy in dancing as a way to cope with her past.
participant_2.background: My aunt helped me escape when I was young. I like to dance. Now I live in the United States. I was born in Somalia.
